content: neck edge continue picking up the number of cast on st for the left sleeve back and right sleeve sections and the same number for right vertical neck edge as for the left edge do not go along lace panel this already has a finished edge pick up fewer st around if you want to bring up the neckline work back and forth knit 3 row knit more row if you want to reduce the width of the neck opening then bind off knitwise with medium to snug gauge neatly sew ends of the new edging to the ends of the top of the lace panel weave in ends and tighten up any holes under arms as necessary page 3 buttercup by heidi kirrmaier version 6 updated for cast-on st august 23 2009 approximate measurements in cm xs s m l xl xxl a 17 0 18 0 19 5 21 0 22 0 23 0 b 12 0 13 0 15 0 15 0 16 0 16 0 c 16 5 17 5 18 5 19 5 19 5 20 5 d 18 0 18 0 19 0 20 0 21 0 21 5 e 25 5 26 5 29 0 31 5 35 5 40 0 f 41 0 45 0 50 0 54 0 59 0 64 0 g 47 5 51 5 56 5 60 5 65 5 70 5 h 40 0 40 0 40 0 40 0 40 0 40 0 abbreviations k = knit kfb = knit into the front and back of stitch increase k2tog = knit 2 together decrease m = make increase p = purl pm = place marker rs = right side sm = slip marker ssk = slip 2 st individually as if to knit then knit together through the back decrease st = stitch es ws = wrong side yo = yarn over increase this pattern is for personal non-commercial use only you may not make or sell electronic or paper copies of this pattern or sell any items made from these instructions without the express permission of heidi kirrmaier page 4 buttercup by heidi kirrmaier version 6 updated for cast-on st august 23 2009
